Name: PECO
About the game: A Puzzle Action Game Based On Green. The player changes in three steps depending on the proportion of the stage reflected in the camera, and the size and jumping power change with the change. Also, some blocks appear when the stage is shown, and some blocks appear when a specific block is shown. Let's guide the player to the goal by considering where to project on the stage considering these gimmicks.(Google Translation)
